name: Drake Cutter
description:
Manufacturer: Drake Interplanetary
Focus: Light Freight
Designed for hard-working folks of all stripes, the Cutter packs 4 SCU of cargo room and plenty of wallop into a rough and tumble, compact frame. It's a ship that truly embodies the spirit of Drake: that no matter who you are or what you do, you can reach the stars.
description_cn:
制造商：德雷克行星际(Drake Interplanetary)
定位：轻型货运
专为各行各业辛劳工作的人们而设计，小刀将4SCU的货运空间和许多玩意儿塞进了这个坚固、狂放而紧凑的框架之中。这是一艘真正代表着德雷克精神的飞船：无论你是谁、从事什么样的工作，都能遨游星空。

shop_rent.layout_name_cn: 斯坦顿(Stanton)-微科星(microTech)-新巴贝奇(New Babbage)-BestInShow_Kiosk
